name: Build a wooden shelter
goal: Safe shelter before nightfall using any sturdy blocks on hand
environment: Pick a flat spot away from lava and steep drops
Prefer areas with nearby trees or dirt if wood is scarce
Capture perceived nearby blocks and entities to guide material choices

steps.title: Scan surroundings and inventory
steps.details: List nearby blocks/items/entities from the latest snapshot so the planner can choose safe building materials. Include options like logs, planks, dirt, cobblestone, or leaves and confirm no mobs are closing in.
checks: Ensure at least one stack of placeable blocks is available
Avoid building in line-of-sight of hostile mobs

steps.title: Collect materials
steps.details: Mine or pick up any solid blocks (logs, planks, dirt, cobblestone). Favor wood but fall back to dirt or stone if inventory is low. Keep fuel (coal/charcoal) for torches if possible.
checks: Keep an escape route clear while gathering

steps.title: Lay out a 3x3 or 4x4 footprint
steps.details: Place a one-block-high outline using whichever solid blocks you have the most of. Keep an opening for a door or trapdoor. If uneven terrain, terraform with spare dirt.
checks: Walls use consistent material to save time

steps.title: Raise walls and install roof
steps.details: Build walls at least two blocks tall with available materials. Cap with a solid roof (slabs, planks, dirt) to block mobs and rain. Use ladders or temporary dirt to reach the roof safely.
checks: No holes that spiders can slip through

steps.title: Secure entrance and light interior
steps.details: Place a door/trapdoor; if unavailable, stack blocks to seal entry at night. Craft torches from coal/charcoal + sticks to light inside and around the perimeter.
checks: Torch or light source placed inside

notes: If wood is limited, mix cobblestone or dirt. Always surface before dusk and keep food handy.
